sentences.sContent: Some parents, understandably, have a very hard time with this one. They may feel that anything their kids do is their business.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some parents, understandably, have a very hard time with this one. They may feel that anything their kids do is their business.
sentences.sCn: 可以理解，有些家长要做到这一条不太容易，他们可能觉得任何孩子的事都是他们的事。

sentences.sContent: Many entrepreneurs understandably fear such scrutiny: they hate standing out, lest their operations become the focus of an investigation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many entrepreneurs understandably fear such scrutiny: they hate standing out, lest their operations become the focus of an investigation.
sentences.sCn: 可以理解，很多企业家都害怕这样的审查：他们不愿意站出来，以免他们的经营成为调查的重点。

words.tran: 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的
可以理解的；可以了解的
被充分理解的；心照不宣的
明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉
